author: Teo Benz
post_text: September 7, 2018 at 4:25 PM#1hi crew, I realized that the moving head do the MIB not in the cue before turning on but 3 cue before. Now, it's not a big deal but ,,, how can I make him do the MIB in the cue that precedes the ignition?

posts.post_text: September 7, 2018 at 5:21 PM#2Change the MIB cell to Late instead of Early.

title: MIB
